text:
ng with adolescents 
• Adolescents are often harshly judged by health workers, other staff and adult women in the maternity setting.
• They face higher risks of eclampsia, puerperal endometritis and systemic infections that older pregnant
women. Babies are at greater risk of being pre-term, underweight and having a severe neonatal condition.
• Young women and girls may not have sufficient information about their sexual and reproductive health an d
